text: Araceli Herrero Figueroa (22 June 1948 - 10 June 2020) was a Spanish writer. Herrero Figueroa was a philologist who focused on the study of the Galician language. She was a professor at the University of Santiago de Compostela. Herrero Figueroa born in Lugo. Herrero Figueroa died during the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain in Lugo from the virus on 10 June 2020, aged 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain Category:Spanish writers
title: Araceli Herrero Figueroa
